channel.title: Safe Zones
channel.description:
this is the start of the deltascape safezone/wildy thing.. [code]public boolean multiCombat() { if((absX >= 3144 && absX <= 3184 && absY >= 3519 && absY <=3656) ||[/code]
is that the area that is multi combat? and if so what what the coords be for everything multi?

item.title: Safe Zones
item.dc:creator: @RuneScapeWPS RuneScapeWPS
item.description:
@RuneScapeWPS wrote:

I think you would just change it to public boolean multiCombat() { if((absX >= 1 && absX <= 1 && absY >= 5000 && absY <=5000) || That makes it so that it is Full out multiple combat on your server. Just put the coords to, like, 1 and 5000 for example

Read full topic
